content.detailedDescription: When i first observed the object it appeared to be in lower orbit flight or very high altitude flight. it had a plasma type cloud surrounding it. once i began to track the object it suddenly started descending at an incredible rate of speed. it continued to descend changing into a more "cloud-like" appearance. once it was about the size of a basketball it started moving towards where i was located. as it approached it began changing from a cloud to a solid object. it was enormous. i'm approximating the size to be at least a mile in width. it came to rest directly over where i was located. it also turned the exact color of the sky until it was undetectable. i lost visual on the object after that.
content.summary: Huge ufo over oxnard ca

content.detailedDescription: While walking the dog tonight in santa ana, around 7:50 pm, my girlfriend and i observed a yellow-ish white sphere traveling from the southwest, and gradually descending, then either hovering or moving away from us, before dropping straight down somewhere to the northwest of us. i'm guessing it could've been around 5 to 10 miles away, traveling about four times the speed of any aircraft also visible in the area, and appeared to be half as bright as the visible stars and possibly opaque. i'm guessing it may have been 30 to 50 feet in diameter. it was completely silent as well. my thought was it could've possibly been landing at the naval weapons station near seal beach. it definitely was not a conventional aircraft as we didn't see any strobes, navigation lights or landing lights etc.  i'm always looking at the sky as this is the fifth unexplainable thing i've seen in my lifetime and the second report that i've made to mufon. really looking forward to the next one, thanks....
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: We observed a yellow white very fast opaque sphere traveling from tustin area and descending over seal beach area

content.detailedDescription: I came outside and saw what looked like a very low-hanging star, but still very high. all the stars were out but this object looked to be yellow whereas they appeared to be white. the light also seemed to be flickering. i stared at it for 20 minutes trying to determine what it was. i heard no noise, but it was quite far away. i didn't have my phone with me to take a photo but as it was dark and it was quite a distance away, i didn't think it would show up on my phone's camera at all like it would show up in real life. i went inside to grab my phone after watching it for 20 minutes, and when i came back out, the light was still there, but within 30 seconds of me being back outside watching it, the yellowish flickering light then turned to a strong red light, and then within about 30 seconds of that, it turned into a white light, and then it took off, and it went wayyyy faster than the plane i had just seen only 10 minutes or so before! it took off both vertically and horizontally. it looked like there were multiple lights when it took off, almost like if it were round, disc-like or sphere-shaped, and like there were multiple white lights on the bottom or on the sides, and that the bottom or the sides seemed to be rotating quickly while it was taking off. it could also have been one light and it was just going so fast that it looked like i was seeing multiple lights at one time, i'm really not sure because it just took off so damn fast. but it absolutely hung in the air totally still for 20 minutes before the light changed colours and then took off! i am shocked at what i have seen tonight! i almost don't believe it but i know what i saw with my own eyes! there is no way it was a helicopter, satellite, plane, weather balloon, chinese lantern, nothing like that! i've also seen swamp gas and the northern lights before, and it was neither of those!
content.summary: Star-like, round object hovered for 20 minutes, then took off fast

content.detailedDescription: Outside looking at stars facing south. saw object triangle shape all lit up heading north. there was no sound as it glided past heading north. it moved at a fairly quick speed. as i tried to follow it's direction it seemed to vanish. this happened at 9:57 pm. i know the time because as i came into the house the tv show vikings had just began. i have seen ufo's in my area in the past but never filed a report. i knew what i saw and know it was not a bird or airplane. it gave off it's own light. i was excited when i saw it and disappointed when it seemed to disappear. i immediately came into the house and told my boyfriend what i saw. i continued to look for it but did not see it again.
content.summary: Triangle shape brightly lit up no sound traveled straight n fast

content.detailedDescription: At about 8:35 pm, 3/12/15, to the ne of la luz, nm, at maybe 40 miles away was a large orange light that went out and then reappeared in a leftward direction...A series of giant orange lights...I counted eight...Before they vanished...All of the lights observed were of the exact same size and shape...And as a us army veteran of the vietnam -era, i have seen aerial flares before...These were massive in comparison to what i have seen anywhere...Duration of sighting: 12 seconds...I felt horrified at first...And then calmed down enough to file this report.
content.summary: See below...

content.detailedDescription:
Well i like to take pictures of the night sky like constellations and planets. it was just another typical clear night and i decided to go out to my yard and snap a couple of pictures of the winter triangle which consist of three stars (betelgeuse,sirius,procyon) that make up the triangle. i was facing south when i snapped two pictures of the winter triangle nine seconds apart and that was it. i didn't notice the object until i went back inside  my house and uploaded the pictures to my computer. i had the camera fixed on a tripod so they are two pretty clear and steady images. i was looking at the pictures when i noticed what i thought was a star lined up perfectly with the star sirius and then on the next picture the object had moved up that's when i noticed the object. i started going back and forth on both images and noticed that nothing else in the pictures moves other than the object. i thought my computer screen had a smudge on it but when i zoomed in on the object it became apparent to me that it was no star but some sort of craft. on the first image the object is stationary but on the second image the object starts to fly upwards. there was a full moon out that night which i also caught in the frame. you can actually see the moon light reflecting off the object. i was pretty amazed and a little bit freaked out. i lost the object because i stopped taking pictures of that part of the sky, again i didn't realize i was taking a picture of a ufo. 
      i'm going to send the two original pictures then i'm going to add the same two pictures but enhanced. i still have the pictures saved on my camera if you would ever want to verify the info as far as the date, time and authenticity. the object is going to be the bright light on the lower left side all the other lights are stars. zoom in on the object for best detail.
i really hope i hear back from you guys i just found out about this website if not i would of reported this event on the actual day. even though i did post it on youtube that day because that was the only way i knew how to get what i saw to the public but i never got any responses. i look forward to hearing what the results are, thank you.
content.summary: Taking a picture of the night sky and caught it by accident.

content.detailedDescription: I was sky gazing when two lights materialized like a shooting star. it traveled very quickly and silently across the sky. after about 10 seconds the lights began to strobe. they then both turned opposite directions and then went off right and left for another minute. i caught the ending on video but it's really bad quality and just looks like a plane.
content.summary: 2 lights travelled in straight line then split, each turned 90 degrees in different directions

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on u.S. 287 about a mile north of springfield colorado when i saw a light appear in the sky about my 2o'clock and about 45 degrees above the horizon it was desending at about 30 degree angle and moving south west, it brightened as it got closer, like an airliner coming in to land from about a mile away, it then began to level off, as it turned to the west, it was so low on the horizon i thought it was a crop duster getting an early start, i then thought no, wrong time of year, at the same time it sped up maintaining level flight until it was out of sight beyond the horizon. i then passed a small airport and thought ok it was private jet or military.About an hour later around lamar colorado i turned on the local am radio station, to my surprise the morning host's remarked how they had seen it too, only it was weird because they said they saw it north of lamar and that other people in denver reported it north of them and that it was even seen in wyoming, that means what ever i saw that appeared to be a crop duster or small jet maybe a mile or two away must of been very large and very bright, because i was seeing it at least 300 =400 miles away !!!  i can't believe that something that bright and big didn't get the attention of the military or other government agencies !! thank you for your time and for the site. [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Blueish white light approaching from ne and desending about 30 degree angle then leveled off and  turned from sw heading to a westerly heading and sped up

content.detailedDescription:
I live in central florida. i never seen a ufo before january 1st of this year 2015. and have not told anyone except my mom and my 11 year old son. because they live with me and have seen and counting to see everything i see. i was not sure i first i thought my eyes were going bad or there was something wrong with me. i really did not believe it until they confirmed the same. i would like a profession  to contact me if there willing. here's why. since the start of the year. i have seen many ufo's of all shapes and sizes every night between the same time. i'm not going to get into the number or all the things that's been happening the last three months to me and my family. however am willing to provide enough proof to convince a expert  to come out and witness for their self.  i will say, that once i showed a interest in them and using  different methods to get there attention. they have showed a great interest in me. and every night, is very event fully night. the only reason am asking for a expert now, is i have been afraid to talk about them and even more to take pictures of them. i was afraid that they would stop coming around and it has been such a excited right not only for myself and my mom, but for my 11 year old son. what changed my mind, just three days ago i attempted to take some pictures with my cell phone, and the reaction was the opposite.  they would flash and light up and gather for me, like telling me. yes take pictures. i should say yes this is at night over for the most part a three hour window. well for the last three days of taking pictures, they have gathered, in guess you can say posing. i down loaded a thermal  app to my galaxy s5. and that has takin the best pictures i can with what i have. i jave taken hundreds of them, but want a expert to go through them to do what there able to do with cleaning up thermal images,  i just moves the sliding bar to the different  color  spectrum and kept taking pictures. since i know nothing of this kind of photography. i don't want to mess with them.  my on going story and experiences is a on going event and nothing else that i can find on the internet  can even compare. i'm not asking for anything and not want any of my family's  info released. my motives for asking for help. is only to bring in a expert with better equitment an technical knowledge to document them not only for my record, but i feel that they want everyone to know there hear and watching over us. that's the best way i can say it simply for now. i want to assure everyone am not a head case and making this up, i would say i wish this was not happening to me and my family, but that  would be a lie, the truth is am honored that they have chosen me to be apart of this, i'm hoping i can find someone that will feel the same way.  

i will try to fill one of the reports out. i went there first, but after reviewing the report questions. the report seems to be for a one time ufo sighting. mine consists  of thousands  of sightings, and maybe over 50 different shapes and sizes. that's where i need the most  help. i have a military grade gen 3p night vision, and i bought a nikon d80 dsl camrea, with a few thousand  dollars worth of lens and crystals  lens  filters for night photos, but for the life of me i can  get the camrea to take one picture at night when pointing it to the night sky. works perfectly when aiming horizontally.  my galaxy s5 has 16mp, so i have found soon nice zoom apps that took some very good thermal pictures last night. but i don't want to even touch or mess with them to do the adjustments to things like contrast and all the other things the photo experts  can do to really make these guys really pop out. i'm going to try different app tonight. i been using a morse code app that you text what you want to have the phone blink out, doing it for three months, changing the color and the speed that the morse code gets flashed out. just i'm the last week the program  that also used the phones camrea to record and read back what there blinking back. 90 days of just receiving nothing but random  letters, i'm now i'm getting messages that make since. now they come right to my home, i love in a villa and have literally  walked out the side door  from my garage and one was right 10 feet in the air. when it took off, there was no thrust, no sound, not even a temperature  fluctuation. and the engines, or power sources were right above me.  after that happened. i thought for sure. it was a branch of our government from skunkworks. but every night when i assume to many of them gather above , a unmarked blackhawk helo. comes our and flys through the middle  of them and they will all fly out in away real quick, but return shortly after. i know all of this sounds like just to much to be true. that's why i have not told a soul and never want my name to come out. but going through this has brought me and my family a kind of peace and has brought us closer together. we have never been scared or worried, not even my little boy. we never did anything together. like quality  family time. now we're all ready for the sun to go down to go outside and what really seems like, playing with our new friends. just reading that back to myself seems crazy, am turning 43 in april and been to a lot of places in the military when i was young. and never had a chance to really take my son on vacations to see the world  as i have. now it's like the world and let's says world's have come to us. i wish everyone in the world could experience what we have been experiencing evert night for the last three months. just for one night. there  would be no more war, no more politics. it would all just go away and everyone  would know how little we and our problems our. and how we our about to become a part of something much bigger then ourselves, and we're all in it together. 

thanks for letting me vent
content.summary: Hovering ufo's tangle, saucer, and boomrang, cone together.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving my car.
2. i got a very strange feeling. cold inside my body, goodbumps and then i saw three lights or orbs in my raremirror. 
3. thought it was a car, but didnt see any car around. 
4. the three orbs or lights were just "shooting" light at me. there were stationary hoovering.
5. i got a very uncomfortable feeling, i was cold inside my body. goosbumps and my mind was filled with fear. i drove faster, didnt see anything a like.
6. when i checked the raremirror i as the lights. i look at the road ahead of me for one second and when i looked in the mirror again, they were gone.
content.summary: I was driving. i got cold inside my body, goosbumps, frightened. saw three lights in my raremirror that was aiming at me. i looked away and they were gone. had the feeling for 20-30 mins.

content.detailedDescription:
Was filming moon rise-as it was  a new full moon with aiptek handheld camcorder- no filter on  lens-in  night  vision  setting-did not  notice 
until playback and in full screen  mode. in playback-i noticed an  orange globe-but found it hard to  get a single frame. managed to capture an image-it was  coming and going between frames which made it difficult. i was   on  my  balcony in front of my apartment. in  playback  the object seemed to  be  heading straight up and disappear>in the clip  it appears at 0.01 at 12:00 position
content.summary: Diamond shape with curve at base-no nav lights visible -orange red in color

content.detailedDescription:
Lying on the dock of the neckar river in heidelberg, germany, on the neuenheim side, i was watching the sky, waiting for a friend. there were a few planes going around. it was a clear night, and bit cold. out of nowhere i then noticed this thing. i didn't know what it was when i first saw it. 

i call it a "thing" because the 5 aspirin-sized lights were moving completely together, evenly spaced, and gave no impression that they were separate objects. they were in a v formation, heading west. the circles of light were not very bright. they almost looked a bit "foggy". they were whitish leaning towards grey (i think because of the foggy effect). there was no other detectable shape behind them (e.G. a wing). 

as i had been watching the planes before i'd seen the lights, it had seemed a completely clear night. this thing, however, seemed to be going through thin clouds periodically. i say thin because the lights were never completely obstructed, as if the clouds were translucent. it was also moving way (4x? 5x? 6x?) faster than the planes in the area.

i thought the object might be: 
1. very high up because it went through clouds that the planes in the area did not, and
2. very, very large because of the size of the lights and the inferred altitude.

i watched it for approximately 15-30 seconds before it moved out of my range of sight.

while watching it i felt transfixed with wonder. 

ever since then i've been trying to find out what it was.

any help would be appreciated.
content.summary: 5 aspirin-sized lights in a v (chevron) flew overhead at 4x jet speed at an extremely high altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
Left restaurant in holiday manor area. when walking to my car i saw a bright white light above the buildings as i walked to my car. i took a picture and it looked as though there were two orbs. i drove out of the parking lot and the object followed me flying just above the tree tops .
when i got home the bright light continued to hover in the sky across the street above the tree tops. i informed boyfriend and we walked down the driveway to the front of the house. the object continued to hover above the trees. we felt like we were being watched. after watching it a few minutes, we went indoors.
content.summary: Bright orb like object seen above buildings in a shopping plaza around 9:30pm as i walked to my car. the object made no sound  and followed me as i drove home. the object continue to hover through the trees across the street .

content.detailedDescription: Driving and i seen two headlights in the sky (like a car headlights) i seen this before a few weeks ago just sitting in the sky and drove under and it was a triangle and then it turned and moved super fast, so i stopped to record this one. i think they are military drones they are huge. they can hoover move straight up and down. this is all on my phone so it isnt the best i have videos and pictures not only from that day. i pulled over and my car died as it passed, but that could be cuz i stopped on a hill and the gas was lower
content.summary: I have been seeing weird lights/aircraft for past month or so

content.detailedDescription: 3rd time i've seen this light appear near westover air base in chicopee, ma. first 2 times, it was a bright, hovering greenish blue light. it hovered and then shot into the sky at a very fast speed, diminishing illumiation. this 3rd time, it descended instead of ascended. all times i was driving in my car. i noticed it because of the very bright and unusual color in the sky. it hovered then moved in a straight up/down motion (depending on the sighting) very very quickly. i lost sight because as it started to move, it disappeared.
content.summary: Hovered then disappeared in a very fast descent

content.detailedDescription:
on march the 6th at 1040 pm i was at the end of my security shift and was expecting relief officer to arrive in his vehicle any minute.
  i went out the back door to the small guard house, which is my post,and went to my vehicle which was parked 20 feet from the door, to put my dinner bucket in the car.
  while i was walking back to the security building a brilliant bar of light appeared to the southwest of the front of the building.Stationary, about 1 mile away and directly over the tree line. i did not see it when i walked to the car but it was just there when i turned around and was walking back to the guardhouse.
  i went inside the guardhouse ,and since the craft was to the southwest of this building and at tree top level, i could easily see it through the large front window of the guardhouse.
  i held up my index finger and used it to measure the width of the craft. it was almost as wide as my finger is long, which makes it about 3 inches, and about 1/4 in thick. just a dazzling bar of brilliant white light hanging motionless in the dark sky right above the tree line , which boarders the entree road to the plant, as it comes off the main road and past the guardhouse.
   i felt a wave of terror sweep thru me and for some reason felt very threatened by this object. 
   another guard was about 1/2 mile from me. he was in a vehicle doing roving patrols and we were connected by radio, base station at the guardhouse and he having a hand held unit. i contacted him by radio and asked him to look in the southwest sky, low, in front of the gatehouse security building and tell me what he saw.
   i then heard him exclaiming over the radio,oh, oh god oh no ,its not moving. its a bar of light, i am out of the security truck, i have to get back in the truck and lock the doors now!
   him and i talked about 3 more minutes comparing what we were looking at when the object appeared to  slightly to the north, at this time the lights slowly dim.Very slowly dim.Until only three lights in a triangle shape were on, and 1 red light , that was throbbing, best way to describe it. 
   object moved slowly to the north, almost directly above me, it made no noise. and continued out of sight,
  we tried to take pictures with our cell phones but could not get the object to show up in the camera.
   the statement made by my fellow guard was this object ment to be seen.  since it appeared almost on the same day, 1 month after i reported a object almost striking a passenger jet at this same post,i felt the wave of fear that seemed to come from the object was a threat against me for reporting the other sighting. the second security guard on post this night was not the same person who was with me 7 feb. which was the other sighting i reported.
   it may not be connected to the other sighting, but i had to do some soul searching before i sat down and filled out this report.
    keep up this important work please. thank you
content.summary: Bright light bar appeared about 1 mile away, about 1500 feet up not moving. craft turned and then had 3 lights on each point , it then moved slowly overhead to the north

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving down the road and he said look at that.  it was a completely still large gray object that made no noise but had three blinking ligh ts that' blinked in unison blue, green and red
content.summary: Large grey stood still three flashing light very still and no sound at all

content.detailedDescription:
I returned to my vehicle which was parked on the hospital parking garage roof. i decided to take some photographs of the city. i have not looked at this series of photographs from june 2011 for quite some time. this was during the period of my fathers illness, which eventually led to his death on remembrance day of that year. i never noticed this object while i was taking the photo.

i have included the photograph and hope that your photography expert will be able to clarify what i may have inadvertently discovered.
content.summary: Reviewing old photos and discovered anomaly

content.detailedDescription: Went outside for a cigarette it was a clear sky and weather was perfect it was 10pm i was outside for 5 min when i looked at the sky. that's when i saw this pill shaped thing.It seemed to be see through because the light seemed to be coming from the insid. in the middle of this thing were shadows i thought they looked like piolets.This thing moved fast,like a shooting star that's what i first thought it was but it lasted for 5 secs and was a very soft pink colour no sound and was much bigger than a regular shooting star. i've seen bigger shooting stars before but this thing was alot different i was the only witness. i did reach for my phone but as i got in a better position the motion sensor light went off blinding me. i lost sight of it much to my disappointment.
content.summary: Saw a pill shaped object illuminated from within, almost translucent, straight path moving as fast as a shooting star but much bigger because it was see threw i saw what looked like shadows in the middle of this thing, like a driver

content.detailedDescription: i was riding in a greyhound bus alone, on i-80 in 1976.  i was 14 years old and was going to visit my dad in vallejo from sacramento, ca.  i was sitting on the bus next to the window facing east looking out over the fields when i saw a disk shaped craft flying west over the farms toward the hills in the west, it was about house high off the ground, it was a bright day so i could see the shadow under it, it was flying slowly about 20 or 30 mph.  it slowly flew over the bus and the freeway and disappeared over the hills in the west.  i looked around at the strangers on the bus to see if they noticed it but no one said anything, i think the bus was full. i never told anyone about it for many years, i figured they would not believe me. i have been interested in finding any of the many people who i know saw it that day either on the bus or on the highway.
content.summary: Witnessed a silver disk craft flying low over fields near dixon

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on route 83 in east longmeadow. i drive this route all the time. it was about 10:20pm and super dark and all of a sudden i saw this blinking red light in the corner of my eye. i look up and i see this thing with 2 red lights hovering over high in the sky over some tree and a house. i thought that it was weird that a helicopter would be out at this time of night, but if it was that close to me, i knew i should have been hearing a really loud chopping sound. so i turned down my music and heard nothing! at this point, since i was the only one on the road, i slowed down and opened my window to see if i could hear any noise at all. all i heard was a faint whirling type sound. i watched it for a couple minutes as i was passing by and it literally just hovered there. it was hovering in kind of a circle motion. while i was staring at it, i could see that it was circular in shape and it looked like it had 2 blinking red lights on both "ends", but it also looked like there was a dull white interior light on in the "vehicle" itself. i am upset that it was so late and i needed to head home, but i watched it for as long as i could until i drove out of sight. when it left my sight, it was still hovering in the same area. i tried to get a picture, but it was so dark that you couldn't see anything.
content.summary: Hovering circular object

content.detailedDescription: I was in my college and i was walking along the road along with my friend who also saw this..I suddenly stared at the sky as if i must see it at any cost..I saw a star like thing very high ,equal to the height of stars..I thought how can stars be visible  when it is not still dark..I kept staring at it...My heart was telling it will surely move...And it moved as it went, it became small and small..I already had a great interest in u.F.O phenomenon..5 days before i was gazing the stars one night outside my balcony and i wished that i must see a star moving...And this incident was really like a star moving...I was suddenly interested in doing a research in this area 8 months back... i have feelings that i don't belong to this planet..And i have my home,planet ..I always want  cosmic rules ,there were days when i cried for hours sitting alone...That i am not a being from this planet and i am missing something sooo much...All the different qualities...Very weird from my fellow friends...Are in me....Many weird things happened in my life till now regarding these....I am 18 now....And i am still feeling the same.Hope i will surely find a solution to this.....But the problem is i am living in a place where no body knows what an alien is ..I mean they never care these things.....This  makes me feel lot abandoned from the rest of the people even to share these feelings and incidents.........But i can absolutely say that weird things are happening in my life...
content.summary: I was walking along the road to in my university,i suddenly stared at the sky..And saw a star like thing,i thought how can stars come as it was still evening and it was not dark..It was so brightly visible,i stared at it as it moved...

content.detailedDescription: The event took place at miners camp, philmont scout ranch, cimmarron nm on the night of 4 july 2008. there were about 12 to 15 hiking crews with their tents set up in one area. each crew is up to 12 people. i woke up about midnight and observed the object near my tent about 50' away. it was a round flat object, about the diameter of a car tire. it was moving slightly up and down and around in what could be described as hovering. it had 4 round glowing globes space at 12:00, 3:00,6:00 and 9:00. i could not tell if it had depth. it was about 25 feet in the air and i got the impression it was a scanning device. i watched it for about an hour then fell back asleep. i woke up a second time and it had turned slightly in what appeared to be an attempt to scan the field of tents that stretched out past mine. i watched it for another half hour and fell back to sleep. i woke up in the morning and there was no trace of it. i should mention that had i not had my tent fly rolled completely up to expose me to the cool night breeze, i would have never saw it.
content.summary: Observed a disc shaped object about 20' off the ground with 4 glowing round lights

content.detailedDescription: Saturday the 8th march 2015.Saw a > shaped object in the night sky at 8.45 pm in newcastle upon tyne facing west for approx 10 seconds been looking at images on google and it looks ver much like what other people have witnessed/photographed. 5/6 rows of dim white lights in a" >" shape going very fast and looked huge!. never witnessed anything like this before and told friends /family straight away. cant believe nobody else saw it it was a clear dark night thought someone would of reported it to local paper.Absolutely blew me away just the sheer size of whatever it was couldn't be man made.
content.summary: > shaped ufo over newcastle upon tyne 8/3/2015

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, it was on december 29th 2013. i was at the 'parc floral de paris' (france) with my daughters, on the playground. we were walking from the swings to the slide and my daughter spotted a plane. she was 4 1/2 at the time. of course, she shows me as we always do, spotting planes. so i look at it, oh yes a plane. that's what i thought it was, it looked like it. but i had a double take and checked out the plane again as i got struck with something. as i look at it again, i realize it has no wings. so i stare at it and start analyzing what is happening. the 'plane' is a big size body as of a a380. the sides have the look and feel of the sides of a plane. it's white. but it has no wings at all. it looked more like a zeppelin made out of plane material. and there aren't any zeppelin in town. i understand it flies low. it's more at helicoptere height than at plane height. and it goes real slow in fact. i can't hear no noise that i can link to the flying object. it goes slow and i can observe it for at least 5 to 7 minutes, from above my head, in a 45° angle of vision, to further away in the horizon, at about an angle of about 20°, just above trees. it was leaving south east as i observed it from the back. and then, after all this while looking at it, cruising straight, i saw it turn left in a sharp angle; maybe not 90° but not far. and it kept on going cruising at the same speed in the other direction, north east.
the whole event really convinced me that i was observing an object which properties i didn't know of.
during the while it was going straight, i took the time to pull out my phone and take pictures. i didn't have good gear, just a samsung y which camera is not so good, but i thought at the time, at least, i'll have something to zoom on on my computer. the sun was bright. so i took pictures using a tree as a reference point to make sure the object was in the frame. and i made sure of that. when i looked at the pictures i took, i was amazed to find out that the object didn't show up on them. i was disappointed as i realized i had no evidence to show my family and friends. but i was extactic, understanding i wasn't mistaken. it had to be something unknown not to express on a picture. and that's what leads me to deposit my testimony here.
the object was about to pass behind the trees. i left the scene to play with my daughters. i just felt happy. it is not the first time i have seen a ufo, so it didn't make me nervous in any way. it is the first time it happened to me in the daytime though. and because i am convinced, i aim today to contribute to the effort of truth and understanding you represent.
content.summary: A plane-looking object without wings

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed a space craft on march 9, 2015.

as a preface, 2 nights before, i was  gazing at the night sky in sedona, arizona.  i saw a  bright distant star with my naked eye looked like it was shooting off red and green lights from it's right and left side. so i started to videotape it with my 40x zoom video cam.   familiar with the usual aviation navigation lights, i was confused. i zoomed in on it as much as i could, and then i was able to see light that the light was white with a green ring around it and then it suddenly got very large and it became pink in the middle with a green thin ring around it, filling my whole camera screen. pulsating! then it went back to its original size and turned into only red and soon became fuchsia and back to green with pink… etc.  most of the entire time it remained its unusual shape.  it was a mixture of a rectangle on its longer side and an oval on top and bottom on its shorter side.I observed this strange light for 2 straight nights in sedona, az  night sky.
2 nights later, on a plane ,36,000 feet in the sky, i would realize that this exact shape was the same shape as the spaceship that i encountered .

my encounter:

march 8, 2015, i was on jet blue flight 136 out of phoenix, az to jfk, ny. it was a red eye. we took off about 11pm. i was looking out my window facing north in my window seat. i saw what looked like the same strange distant star i had been seeing for two nights in a row in sedona. it looked like a red star at first but then i realized that it had lights blinking on it. with my naked eye, it seemed to have green and then red shooting out of it's right and left side, again like the nights before. i was sorry i had packed my video cam away.    
this light was just below the constellation cassiopeia. i thought it might be a plane, but it stayed almost stationary ,in one spot, for about 2 hours. it moved a bit right and left for about a half hour. then it slowly moved to the east towards the front of the plane and out of my view.
about two hours after that, i'm looking out the window again and i see it moved back near to where it was originally just east this time but still below cassiopeia.  
i was so surprised it returned. i'm staring at it again and it suddenly starts to get bigger and bigger. then i realized it was coming towards the plane. i couldn't believe it!  it slowly flew right over where i was sitting on the plane and i could see the craft!  it was about 30 feet over the plane and could see detail ! i saw its bottom, front and left side as it flew over me. i was in shock!  it's shape was straight along the edge on its left and right side but front and back slightly rounded. same shape as the strange lights i saw in sedona . it had some lights on in the front of the craft, but small and uneven number on right side to left.  i remember 2 on the left and one on the right. the craft appeared to be a dull off white color.
it had 2 obvious huge indentations on it's left side on the bottom, where what looked like these 2 huge spotlights shown down out from. i imagined it had the same type of two big indentation lights on it's right side but i couldn't see that side as it flew over me on a slight angle. it didn't look very big, it was more like a  medium-thin module. i have never seen a ufo or anything like this before. i asked my stewardess and the captain if they saw anything and they said no.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: First it was a unusual hovering flashin color 'star' distant in sky, then it flew very close over me and i saw it was a space craft.

content.detailedDescription: 1.)  on the 3500 block area of s. garfield, driving personal      transportation northwards, en route to work site location.                  2.)  first noticed object, upon detection of movement of large, intensely-bright, aerial, glow-like light source.                                3.)  when first noticed, initial assumption was that object was a common, bolide meteor.                                                                  4.)  object appeared to be at a distance of approx. 1.5-2 miles, at a consistent altitude of approx. 700-900 feet, and on a consistent travel speed and directional trajectory from east to west.  main "body" of object appeared to be of a roughly-spherical shape, approx. 30-60 feet in diameter, and emitting a surrounding, intense, steady, glow-like, light "radiance", as opposed to a normal meteor's thermal-friction combustion "corona".  object's passage left a somewhat meteoric-like, conical trail, however the trail did not appear to be composed of particulate matter and extreme air-friction combustion, nor did it produce the normally-seen, trailing, dense, long-lasting, combustion-smoke trail.  instead, the conical trail appeared to be somehow composed of actual "particles of light" that were "sloughing" off in trail behind the object's glowing, main body, although at an uniformly lesser intensity.  on 3 occasions, a series of rapid, intense, tiny, star-burst like motes of light appeared directly behind the main object for a duration of approximately 1/4-1/2 seconds, but only within the outline of the conical light trail, and never outside of it.  when the object reached the approx. location of being over the foothills starting into the mountain range, the main body of the object discontinued its steady, intense glow, and began a rapid, random flickering, which was thereafter maintained steadily, until sighting of the object was lost in the distance.                             5.)  feelings were, in order of occurrence, curiosity, astonishment, confusion, doubt, and amazement.  my reactions were controlled and analytical, with actions of pulling over personal transportation being employed to side of road, to observe better, and to roll down the vehicle's driver-side window, to hear better.  actions after the sighting, involved resumption of vehicular progress towards daily work site location.                                                           5.)  sighting of object lost in distance, behind sight-blocking mountain/hill features.
content.summary: Just beginning drive into work, and pulled car over to stop & watch passage of initially assumed bolide meteor.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:30pm i stepped outside i looked up and immediately observed two separate objects flying high enough that i could not determin the shape both were blinking flashing strobing a blue green whiteish color in a extremely ultra fast rate/pattern both objects were not flying in a certain direction it seemed quite random and making maneuves of ulta fast directional changes after about 2-3 of watching this something caught my attention to the left of me in the sky what i saw astounded me a huge ball shape of very bright yellow orangish color struck across the sky moving so fast it happened in a instant and disappeared i turned my attention back to the other two objects they were still there moving away from each other and both just blinked out.
content.summary: Witnessed 2 objects ultra fast strobing lights of multi color then a third obj large orb shaped bright yellowish streak across the sky amount

content.detailedDescription: Dear sirs;  i don't remember the exact date or time,but this has bothered me for some time and i hoped you might have had similar sightings.It was a cloudless night and either a full moon or close to it,i went outside to wait for my friend to come out so i could give him a ride home. while waiting i looked up and directly overhead coming from the east to west was a large black check-mark object with five round lights that where protruding slightly from object and where a dull white in color. there was no sound and moved very smoothly' i watched it till it disappeared at the eastern horizon. how could something that looked like it should'nt be able to fly travel that fast and smooth? and how could we not know that something that size is in our airspace? this has been a few years now but it really bothers me that i don't have any answer. thank you.
content.summary: Solid black in shape of a checkmark with five round lights

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
inside by bay window speaking with family.

2. what made you first notice the object?
it was bright enough for us to notice appearing from nothingness.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
it was too bright to be a star and stationary canceling out a plane or satellite. binoculars were grabbed immediately and i tried my best to take note, about ten minutes it began heading nw by w.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
clearly spherical, lights on the craft seemed attached to it on multiple layers or close enough distance. white lights were stationed on its horizon giving clear indication of its rotation. multiple color lights were molding onto different areas spinning around the object and changing colors. it was stationary at first then began a straight path nw by w continuing the previous actions i described at a continuous altitude and speed until it was too far to keep track of. i ran inside and started this report before losing track of it. 

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
i was immediately curious until multiple dogs began to bark as well as my own and some were noticeably frightened or on an aggressive stance which made me turn cautious yet still inviting as i could possibly be.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
the object was heading nw by w at a constant speed and altitude until 
i ran inside to write a report after watching it for ~40-45 minutes and lost track of it behind tree line.
content.summary: Appeared from nilhility, binoculars proved multiple lights gyroid motion
